name: Private Tyrone

topics.response_text: Hey, hey. What can Tyrone do for you?
Just making some deliveries to the troops here in Primm. I'm stationed in California, but I come across the border a couple times a month.

topics.topic_text: A friend in Sloan told me to come to you about some chemical supplies.
topics.response_text: {hushed}You trying to get me busted? Keep your damn voice down - Lieutenant Hayes already has his eye on me.

topics.topic_text: You were already paid in advance.
topics.response_text: Yeah, and as it turns out, the advance wasn't enough. The price has gone up. That's just how it goes.

topics.topic_text: I say the word and someone else will start making deliveries to Nevada, not you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I've reconsidered my position, and I think it would be in my best interest if I were to sacrifice my profit on this particular deal.

topics.topic_text: Is 300 caps worth being known as a deal-breaker? Seems like bad business to me.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, I'll just eat the cost and do a favor for Chomps. Just this one time only.

topics.topic_text: Here's 300 caps. Hand over those supplies.
topics.response_text: Pleasure doing business with you.{winking}Of course, this whole deal never happened, am I right?

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Whatever. You know where to find me.
Still got 'em. You ready to pay up?

topics.topic_text: How do you like being part of the NCR military?
topics.response_text: It's better than farming or herding Brahmin. As long as they don't send me to the front lines, I'm a happy man.

topics.topic_text: How about you and I come to another arrangement. It'll be worth it - trust me.
topics.response_text: {Black Widow}Well, it has been awhile. All right, let's do this.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry, but all these muscles make it hard to hear sometimes. What was that about risk?
topics.response_text: {Strength 7+}{intimidated by player's strength}Uh, never mind. Take the supplies. All yours, friend.

description:
Private Tyrone is a 29 year-old Asian Male.

A disciplined NCR trooper responsible for supply deliveries between California and Primm. Tyrone has noticed irregularities in the supply chain and suspects chemical supplies are being diverted to the Great Khans.

Private Tyrone's Personality: Disciplined and observant, Private Tyrone is loyal to the NCR but increasingly concerned about corruption within the ranks. He maintains a professional demeanor but shows signs of disillusionment.

Private Tyrone's Backstory: Born and raised in California, Tyrone enlisted in the New California Republic army at a young age. After several years of service, he was assigned to supply duty along the California-Nevada border. Over the past few months, he's noticed that certain chemical supplies have been going missing during transit, and he's begun to suspect that higher-ups are involved in a smuggling operation that funnels these supplies to the Great Khans, who use them to produce drugs for the Fiends.
